name: Jason Wu
introduction: I am a software developer with experience working in global corporations and local startups. Have an exciting job opportunity that you want to let me know about? I'd love to hear from you!
Iâ€™m fortunate to have contributed to Cengea's Land Resource Manager, a RADARSAT Constellation Mission project with MDA and most recently, a bestselling Nintendo Switch title with Electronic Arts.

At the end of February this year, I went on a trip of a lifetime with my girlfriend to Western Europe, we explored over 15 different cities, ranging from London, UK to Lisbon, Portugal to Prague in the Czech Republic.

When I'm not hiking on the trails of British Columbia, you can find me playing all sorts of video games from RTSs to RPGs. My latest fascination is with Monster Hunter: World and Warhammer: Vermintide 2.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computing Science
